Queries.SelectUsuario: SELECT u.Id, u.Cedula, u.Correo, u.NombreYApellido, u.Celular, u.TipoUser, u.Estado, r.IdRol FROM act_User u LEFT JOIN act_RolUser r ON u.Id = r.IdUser WHERE u.Correo = @Correo AND u.Contrasena = @Contrasena
Queries.SelectEmail: SELECT Correo FROM act_User Where Id =1
Queries.SelectDestino: SELECT Id, NumeroCuenta, NombreBanco FROM act_CuentaDestino
Queries.SelectListUser: SELECT Id, NombreYApellido FROM act_User WHERE TipoUser = 'Socio' OR TipoUser = 'Administrador'
Queries.SelectEvents: SELECT (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM act_Eventos WHERE Estado = 'CONCURSO') AS TotalEventos, x.*, u.NombreYApellido AS NombreUsuario FROM act_Eventos x INNER JOIN act_User u ON x.IdUser = u.Id WHERE x.Estado = 'CONCURSO'
Queries.SelectAportaciones: SELECT (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM act_Aportaciones) AS TotalAportaciones, a.*, u.NombreYapellido AS NombreUsuario FROM act_Aportaciones a INNER JOIN act_User u ON a.IdUser = u.Id
Queries.SelectMultas: SELECT (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM act_Multas) AS TotalMultas, a.*,  u.NombreYApellido AS NombreUsuario FROM act_Multas a INNER JOIN act_User u ON a.IdUser = u.Id
Queries.SelectAdminNotificacion: SELECT (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM act_Notificaciones WHERE Destino = 'ADMINISTRADOR') AS TotalNotificaciones, a.* FROM act_Notificaciones a WHERE a.Destino ='ADMINISTRADOR'
Queries.SelectUserNotificacion: SELECT (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM act_Notificaciones WHERE Destino = @Id) AS TotalNotificaciones, a.* FROM act_Notificaciones a WHERE Destino = @Id
Queries.SelectPrestamoId: SELECT (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM act_Prestamos WHERE Id = @Id) AS TotalPrestamos, a.* FROM act_Prestamos a WHERE Id = @Id
Queries.SelectPrestamosUser: SELECT (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM act_Prestamos WHERE IdUser = @IdUser) AS TotalPrestamos, (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM act_Prestamos WHERE IdUser = @IdUser AND Estado = 'APROBADO') AS TotalAprobado, (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM act_Prestamos WHERE IdUser = @IdUser AND Estado IN ('DENEGADO', 'RECHAZADO')) AS TotalRechazado, (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM act_Prestamos WHERE IdUser = @IdUser AND Estado  IN ('PENDIENTE REFERENTE', 'PENDIENTE ADMIN')) AS TotalPendiente, (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM act_Prestamos WHERE IdUser = @IdUser AND TipoCuota ='PagoUnico') AS TotalPagoUnico, (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM act_Prestamos WHERE IdUser = @IdUser AND TipoCuota = 'CUOTA') AS TotalCuota, a.* FROM act_Prestamos a WHERE IdUser = @IdUser
Queries.SelectEventosUser: SELECT (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM act_Eventos WHERE Id = @Id) AS TotalEventos, a.* FROM act_Eventos a WHERE Id = @Id
Queries.SelectCoutasUser: SELECT *.a FROM act_Cuotas a WHERE IdUser = @IdUser AND Estado = 'PENDIENTE'
Queries.SelectIdCoutas: SELECT *.a FROM act_Cuotas a WHERE Id = @Id
Queries.SelectAportacionesUser: SELECT (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM  act_Aportaciones WHERE IdUser = @IdUser) AS TotalAportaciones, (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM  act_Aportaciones WHERE Aprobacion='APROBADO' AND IdUser = @IdUser) AS TotalAprobados, (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM  act_Aportaciones WHERE Aprobacion='EN ESPERA' AND IdUser = @IdUser) AS TotalEspera, a.* FROM act_Aportaciones a WHERE a.IdUser = @IdUser
Queries.SelectMultasUser: SELECT (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM act_Multas WHERE IdUser = @IdUser) AS TotalMultas, (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM act_Multas WHERE Estado='CANCELADO' AND IdUser = @IdUser) AS TotalCancelados, a.* FROM act_Multas a WHERE a.IdUser = @IdUser
Queries.SelectIdMultaUser: SELECT * FROM act_Multas WHERE Id = @Id AND  IdUser = @IdUser

Assistant.SelectLastIdAporUser: SELECT IdApor FROM act_Aportaciones WHERE IdUser = @IdUser ORDER BY Id DESC LIMIT 1
Assistant.SelectLastIdPresUser: SELECT IdPres FROM act_Prestamos WHERE IdUser = @IdUser ORDER BY Id DESC LIMIT 1
Assistant.SelectLastIdMultUser: SELECT IdMult FROM act_Multas WHERE IdUser = @IdUser ORDER BY Id DESC LIMIT 1
Assistant.SelectLastIdCoutaUser: SELECT Id FROM act_Cuotas WHERE IdUser = @IdUser ORDER BY Id DESC LIMIT 1
Assistant.SelectLastIdMultaUser: SELECT Id FROM act_Multas WHERE IdUser = @IdUser ORDER BY Id DESC LIMIT 1
Assistant.SelectLastIdCapturaPantallaUser: SELECT Id FROM act_CapturasPantalla WHERE IdUser = @IdUser ORDER BY Id DESC LIMIT 1
Assistant.SelectCorreoUser: SELECT Correo FROM act_User WHERE IdU = @IdUser

Automatic.SelecDateCuotasAll: SELECT a.Id, a.IdUser, a.FechaCuota FROM act_Cuotas WHERE Estado = 'PENDIENTE'
